END.Description: The end of the respawn sequence.

PREPARING_TO_SUMMON_PILLARS.Description: The crystal beams remain directed upwards.

START.Description: The crystal beams are directed upwards into the sky.

SUMMONING_DRAGON.Description:
All crystals (including those from the pillars) are aimed towards the
 sky.

SUMMONING_PILLARS.Description:
The crystal beams are directed from pillar to pillar, regenerating
 their crystals if necessary.
